channel.title: Powergui on Beautiful Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Powergui on Beautiful Hugo

item.title: Developer meets PowerCLI - awesomeness ensues
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: A couple of days ago, while I was at VMworld Europe I got the following tweet from Asbjørn A. Mikkelsen (@neslekkim) (translated from norwegian): @h0bbel Do you know if I can script something against vCenter to duplicate (or create from template) VMs, and also start/stop them? My immediate response, was of course to suggest using PowerCLI. Asbjørn, who works as a full time developer, jumped at PowerCLI immediately and within a very short time frame came up with a PowerCLI script for the task at hand.
